.. _colSums_flex:
``colSums_flex``
====================

colSums_flex

Description
-----------

colSums_flex

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   colSums_flex(mymatrix)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``mymatrix``
     - matrix to use
